data.title: Nova (Marvelette film)
data.meta_description: Nova is a Marvelette Cinematic Universe Phase Six film. Chris Pine as Richard Rider / Nova (Death) Tyler Alvarez as Sam Alexander ...
data.text:
Nova is a Marvelette Cinematic Universe Phase Six film. It was released on June 27th, 2025 following X-Men: the Mutant Menace and preceding Doctor Strange: Through the Looking Glass. The film is directed by Doug Liman.

Cast[]

Chris Pine as Richard Rider / Nova (Death)

Tyler Alvarez as Sam Alexander / Nova (First Appearance)

Alex Pettyfer as Michael Korvac (First Appearance) (Death)

Diego Luna as Jesse Alexander (First Appearance)

Jessica Alba as Eva Alexander (First Appearance)

Jenna Ortega as Kaelynn Alexander (First Appearance)

Camila Mendes as Carrie Cardenas (First Appearance)

Glenn Close as Nova Prime (Death)

John C. Reilly as Rhomann Dey (Death)

Jeffrey Wright as Uatu the Watcher

Kim Jong-dae as Amadeus Cho (First Appearance)

Crew[]

Doug Liman: Director

Kid Marvelette: Executive Producer

Kevin Feige: Executive Producer

Christopher Markus: Writer

Stephen McFeely: Writer

Trinh Tran: Producer

Louis D'Esposito: Producer

Michael Giacchino: Composer

Plot[]

When teenager Sam Alexander accidentally uncovers his drunken father's old Nova helmet, he is thrust into a galaxy of danger when he becomes the newest target of Michael Korvac. Teaming up with veteran Nova, Richard Rider, the two of them work together to stop Korvac and save the universe.

Trivia[]
